text: bola geudeul-i midneun salamdeul-eul mannass-eulttaeneun ulido midnaida lagomalhago geudeul-i gaggag mannass-eulttaeneun hananim ap-eseo jeung-geoga doedolog ha nanim-i neohoedeul-ege gyesihan geos-eul geudeul-ege yaegihaeya doeneunyo neohoe deul-eun ihaehaji moshaneun jadeul-i a nideonyo hadeola
